mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* insertDetailCode */ T_PMS015 (grp_cd, dtl_cd, dtl_cd_nm, dtl_cd_desc, rgt_tm, rgt_id, upt_tm, upt_id) VALUES (#{grpCd}, #{dtlCd}, #{dtlCdNm}, #{dtlCdDesc}, NOW(), #{rgtId}, NOW(), #{uptId})
mapper.delete: DELETE /* deleteDetailCodeByGrpCd */ FROM T_PMS015 WHERE grp_cd = #{grpCd}
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectDetailCode */ grp_cd AS grpCd, dtl_cd AS dtlCd, dtl_cd_nm AS dtlCdNm, dtl_cd_desc AS dtlCdDesc, rgt_tm AS rgtTm, rgt_id AS rgtId, upt_tm AS uptTm, upt_id AS uptId FROM T_PMS015 WHERE 1 = 1 AND grp_cd = #{grpCd} AND dtl_cd = #{dtlCd}
SELECT /* selectCntDetailCode */ COUNT(1) FROM T_PMS015 WHERE 1 = 1
